title: Cloudflare Auth Service
description: A standalone authentication service deployable to Cloudflare Workers with D1 database, JWT tokens, multi-project support, and OAuth integration.
rules: This is a standalone deployable service, not an npm package. Do not import it. Interact via REST API fetch calls only.
Every API endpoint requires a projectId obtained from /api/admin/projects.
Run migrations before first use: npm run db:migrate
Change default admin credentials (admin@example.com / Admin123!) immediately after deployment.
